full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA GA-YANG 'GUGS CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (CES RTA GA-YANG @007A *, ,'GUGS CHO GA 'DI YUL GYI MI RNAMS RTA'I GA-YANG SHING TU NYAMS NAS NYAM THAG PA LA, BYAMSM PA'I KUN LAS BLANG TE THA SHAL SMYON PA'I SBYAR YUL BA SU MA TI KARMA MING CAN GYIS, SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYI GA-YANG KHUG SOGS LA GZHI BYAS NAS 'PHRAL DU BRIS PA'O, ,NOR 'KHRUL BYUNG NA MKHAS PA RNAMS LA CHAGS SO, BDAG LA SGRIB PA MI 'BYUNG BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA, DGE BAS 'GRO KUN DBUL BA'I SDUG BSNGAL DANG BRAL NAS MYUR DU DAG PA'I ZHING KHAMS SU SKYE BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: SU MA TI KARMA MING CAN,
